name: Project Tear It Up
description:
PLEASE NOTE: This is a very early prototype of an action sports game I started working on. This might not end up as a skateboarding game, the character model is temporary and was bought on the Unity Asset Store.

After playing, please consider filling out this short, anonymous feedback form. Every bit of feedback helps me improve the game!

This game supports keyboards, Xbox gamepads, and PS4 gamepads.

Keyboard controls:

  • Movement/Menu navigation: WASD
  • Select: Spacebar
  • Cancel: Backspace
  • Pause menu: Escape
  • Jump: Spacebar or down arrow key
  • Rail grind: Up arrow key

Gamepad controls:

  • Movement/Menu navigation: Left analog stick/D-pad
  • Select: Bottom face button
  • Cancel: Right face button
  • Pause menu: Start/Options
  • Jump: Bottom face button
  • Rail grind: Top face button
